level.heading: Articles of incorporation and bylaws.
level.text: A universal bank may operate under the articles of incorporation and bylaws which were in effect before the universal bank's certification as a universal bank or under subsequently amended articles of incorporation and bylaws which are consistent with the provisions and purposes of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-308
level.text: For Law 13-308, see notes following ยง 26-1401.01.
